text: Guyana competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, United States. Ten competitors, eight men and two women, took part in twelve events in three sports. ==Athletics== Women's Long Jump *Jennifer Inniss :* Qualification -- 6.17 m (→ did not advance, 13th place) ==Boxing== ==Cycling== Three cyclists represented Guyana in 1984. ;Individual road race * Randolph Toussaint -- did not finish (→ no ranking) ;Sprint * James Joseph ;Points race * Aubrey Richmond ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1984 Summer Olympics 1984 Category:1984 in Guyanese sport
title: Guyana at the 1984 Summer Olympics
